name: Yume's Helper
short_description:
Assisted macro-based commands for HawtMaple.

Very useful for explaining the same things over and over to newbies over whispers. It also enhances gameplay traversal and provides seamless integration without having to ALT+TAB, commands be used in or out of game, although there's more native support for in-game functioning.

Purpose : I find that megaphones tend to be flooding the chat if the explanation is thorough. If it is not, the newbie tends to ask more questions.

Frustrated with this, I decided to come up with a utility that can be comprehensive in nature and be useful to players and people with significant game knowledge alike.

Utility commands require you to go to in-game settings and set it to windowed mode(ALT+TAB). Lower screen monitor resolutions might not be supported.

Virus Scans :
1 False positive result from macro-text replacing mostly.
